OOC: Actually Scorponok did not fire last round Scourge did. Scorponok
is holding his shot since he cannot, at this point, see well in the
dark. However Scourge has no problem targeting folks in the dark due
to his tracking sensors and enhanced senses, and he is firing at
Nightshift :)

However it does seem that I misread your last post. I didn't realize
that Tuscon had made it all the way into the throne room before we
posted the description of the fortress rising.

Before I post for Scourge and Scorponok I need to understand what they
are seeing. What shape is Tuscon in?

Before you answer, please keep in mind that as soon as the fortress
came out of the magma, it would have been pretty much as I described
in the last post I made for the base.

The displaced magma should have made it difficult for any ground based
person to approach immediately - imagine something like a huge ocean
liner or larger rising from the water, and the amount of splashing
that would have occurred as it broke the surface - however here it is
searing hot magma! Once the base rose, it would have opened fire on
the Maximals, which would have included Tuscon, especially as he was
standing there ripping open the front doors. Then also there are the
interior defenses which would have been firing at Tuscon, or any other
Maximal or Autobot the whole time that they made their way to the
throne room. That is a lot of firepower flying around.

What is Tuscon's condition, so I can have folks react accordingly?

Thanks
Preston
